title: Protocol for Life Balance EGCG Green Tea Extract

cleaned_text: - [All Products](/store/c13/All_Products.html) - > - Protocol for Life Balance EGCG Green Tea Extract Protocol for Life Balance EGCG Green Tea Extract Supports Cellular Health200 mg EGCg / 80% Catechins One capsules of Protocol For Life Balance EGCg, 200 mg, possesses the phytonutrient content equal to about 2-3 cups of green tea. Green Tea Extract contains numerous compounds, including Polyphenols and Catechins, that provide potent antioxidant benefits. One catechin in particular, EGCg, has demonstrated extraordinary free radical quenching power in laboratory studies. In non-clinical studies, EGCg has also been shown to be protective against chemical and environmental assault on tissues and helps to support healthy cell cycle regulation.*HOW IT WORKS: Green Tea has been extensively studied. Researchers have found its active constituents to be a family of polyphenols called catechins. One catechin in particular, epigallocatechin-3-gallate (EGCg) has demonstrated extraordinary free radical quenching power in laboratory studies.* One capsule of Protocol For Life Balance® EGCg, 200 mg, possesses the phytonutrient content equal to about 2-3 cups of green tea.* Servings Per Container: 90 As a dietary supplement, take 1 capsule daily with a meal.
